item.description:
Who wants some Indian food?

 

We'll be meeting at Rasoi, an Indian restaurant that serves a vegan (and gluten free) buffet each Saturday.

 

It's great to find a local establishment that has so many vegan options.  It's even better to enjoy great vegan food with fellow vegetarians and vegans.  Eat, chat and have fun!

 

We've tried this place before, and everyone seemed quite happy with the food.  Parking is easy, with a large lot in front of the eatery.  We'll meet outside, just in front of the restaurant.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting just outside, or try my cell (401) 699-7304

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Vegan Indian Lunch Buffet at Rasoi
